title: Classic French Onion Soup
text: Caramelize onions in butter, add beef broth, thyme, and sherry, then top with toasted baguette slices and melted Gruyère.

title: Nashville Hot Fried Chicken Sandwich
text: Fry seasoned chicken thighs, brush with spicy cayenne oil, and serve on brioche buns with pickles and slaw.

title: Shepherd’s Pie
text: Layer ground beef and vegetables with mashed potatoes on top, bake until golden brown.

title: Chicken Pot Pie
text: Cook chicken with carrots, peas, and creamy gravy, fill in pastry crust, bake until golden.

title: Tomato Soup and Grilled Cheese
text: Simmer tomatoes with garlic and cream, serve with buttery toasted cheese sandwiches.
